channel.title: Automatic Updating Client
channel.description:
I'm not new here, but I'm pretty much brand new to coding and hope I can start learning a lot from this community to become a top-notch coder. Sorry, just introducing myself. Anyways....
How would I go about making an auto updating client. I've seen servers with them so I know its possible. Basically they would just have to download the client and all the class files and all that would not be viewable. They would just have to open client and if I updated my version of the client, their client would automatically download the update. How would I go about doing this?
-Tchandle
